ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] new player on Bertoxx
ygData.msgSnippet: you are MOST welcome :) hope your stay with us is wonderfull :) ... From: Scott Sent: Monday, May 14, 2001 2:25 PM To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
you are MOST welcome :) hope your stay with us is wonderfull :)



----- Original Message -----
From: Scott
Sent: Monday, May 14, 2001 2:25 PM
To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] new player on Bertoxx


Hello!
I had been looking for a G/L/B/T posting site for EverQuest and
finally found you all today. Hurray!

I am on the Bertoxx server and have 16th cleric Cryzstal, 9th
paladin Pyotr, and 8th druid Leatherboy. (Leatherboy's original name
was gayboy but I thought that was a little too 'in-your-face'.)

I have another friend who I group with late night who is gay and
would love to meet or hear from other people.

Thanks for your replies!

Scott aka Pyotr
